text: The Loebner prize is an award given out every year to a chatterbot. The winner is chosen by a Turing test: Each judge talks (text-based) to a chatterbot and to a human. The judge guesses which is which. The contest started in 1990 by Hugh Loebner. The first winner was "Whimsical Conversation". == References == == Other websites == * Category:Science awards Category:Software
title: Loebner prize
